channel.title: How do i add a shop :(
channel.description: i try so hard to make a shop..i get go in the auto-spawn.config spawn a npc..then u goto shops.config copy and paste a shop then change the id to the next highest,what i do not get is when i edit the items in shopd.config it does not change them in the game please tell me why? i now im missing something. can u tell me what im missing and what to do to fix my problem you can flame idc.... im not that good of a coder....

item.title: How do i add a shop :(
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Well I code delta more then I do PI. I think yours is PI because of auto-spawn.config.

I can’t really tell you what’s wrong, but in Delta when you add a shop you do exactly what you just said, BUT you have to also add something else that says Wanneshop and then your shop id.

I am not sure if you need that in PI or if it even exists but you can try looking for something like that =/ hope it helps.

Read full topic
